name: Planetary Golf (Elvis L, Ivan Garcia FIlho)
name_original: Planetary Golf (Elvis L, Ivan Garcia FIlho)
description:
How?

Play as an astronaut travelling through different moons playing golf in space! Hit the ball into each hole around the moons while facing different challenges with gravity and asteroids!
